news.title: Aave Labs seeks $50M grant to redirect product revenue to DAO
news.titleOriginal: Aave Labs seeks $50M grant to redirect product revenue to DAO
news.summary: Some community members questioned the size of the $50 million package and warned that the proposed AAVE token grant could concentrate voting power.

news.title: Bitcoin ETFs bleed $410M as Standard Chartered slashes BTC target
news.titleOriginal: Bitcoin ETFs bleed $410M as Standard Chartered slashes BTC target
news.summary: US spot Bitcoin ETFs are on track for a fourth consecutive week of losses as Standard Chartered cut its 2026 Bitcoin target to $100,000.
